name: Honchkrow
author: Kazuyuki Kano
flavor_text: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous MURKROW in tow.

poke_body.name: Dark Genes
poke_body.effect: As long as Honchkrow has the Energy necessary to use its attack, each of your Murkrow can use Honchkrow’s attack as its own without the Energy necessary to use that attack.

attacks.name: Dark Wing Flaps
attacks.effect: Choose 1 card from your opponent’s hand without looking. Look at the card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.
